name: Market Research / Lead Generation Specialist (B2B, Remote)
description:
Brane is a marketing company that helps mobile developers grow their businesses. We bring together data & creativity to establish forward-thinking marketing strategies. Brane is an official Facebook Marketing Partner and cooperates with such clients as Alibaba Group, My.com, KING, JOOM, and others.

We are looking for a Market Research / Lead Generation Specialist (B2B) to help our business development team find high-potential clients. If you are interested in finding future startup unicorns and won’t get tired of looking into analytics & business reports, then we are more than happy to have a chat!

What you’ll do:

Manage the overall market research and lead generation process:

  • Dig into the mobile analytics reports, follow business trends on such websites as YC, Product Hunt, VC and others to find the best possible cooperation opportunities;

  • Fill and update the company’s CRM system with new leads;

  • Assign leads & tasks to business development representatives to make sure they hit on time

  • Help Brane be ahead of the game;

What you’ll bring:

  • 1+ years or equivalent experience;

  • Analytical background & ability to work with data sets (Excel knowledge will be a plus);

  • Self-disciplined with the ability to work independently;

  • Fluent English: written and spoken (B2+);

  • Flexible and ready to adjust if the goal demands so;

  • Not afraid to fail, ask questions and always eager to learn

  • Make decisions based on available data and information.

What you’ll get:

  • Competitive salary and result-oriented bounty program;

  • Flexible work schedule;

  • 100% Remote work;

  • Nontrivial challenges in a fast-growing company with excellent opportunities for personal and professional development;

  • Real opportunity to contribute to the Company’s results.
